snippet: Negative, out-of-context attacks have come to define this presidential campaign -- as has the offense that is inevitably taken by the other side.
abstract: Negative, out-of-context attacks have come to define this presidential campaign -- as has the offense that is inevitably taken by the other side.

headline.main: The 2012 Cycle: Attack, Feign Outrage, Repeat
headline.print_headline: Political Memo; The 2012 Cycle: Attack, Feign Outrage, Repeat
